entry.title: We think 𝗚𝗨𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗗 𝗢𝗡𝗕𝗢𝗔𝗥𝗗𝗜𝗡𝗚 is a keeper 😊 And for those unaware: If you’re an existing member of De...
entry.summary:
We think 𝗚𝗨𝗜𝗗𝗘𝗗 𝗢𝗡𝗕𝗢𝗔𝗥𝗗𝗜𝗡𝗚 is a keeper 😊 And for those unaware: If you’re an existing member of Developer DAO — you can enrol in our 𝗥𝗲-𝗢𝗻𝗯𝗼𝗮𝗿𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗴𝗿𝗮𝗺 via the link below ⇩ https://forms.gle/GKnjf1N8YLGoHEA56 https://twitter.com/zuzazuber/status/1636389778315960328
Zuz: Getting into a new DAO and finding your way within it is challenging. Apart from the @developer_dao 😍 They just revamped their onboarding process and it's been the smoothest experience I've had. Straightforward, proactive, caring. Big TY to @boyluan for putting it together! https://t.co/nTE5ldq4Xl
